snippet: ABC carries the night as the lone broadcast network to show only original programming.
abstract: ABC carries the night as the lone broadcast network to show only original programming.
lead_paragraph: As the only broadcast network boasting an entire lineup of original programming on Wednesday night, ABC easily finished in first place in all the major ratings categories. "Modern Family" led the way as the highest-rated show in the 18-to-49-year-old demographic, and it drew its largest audience since its season premiere in September, with 14 million total viewers.

headline.main: ABC, With No Reruns, Proves a Magnet for Viewers
